metadata.creator: Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.
metadata.description: This is an audio recording of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. giving the "I Have a Dream" speech during the Civil Rights rally on the steps at the Lincoln Memorial in Washington D.C. on August 28, 1963.
metadata.title: I Have a Dream, Martin Luther King Jr.
metadata.notes: The Project Gutenberg text of this speech is also availible at the Internet Archive site: http://www.archive.org/details/dream10
metadata.subject: Speeches
metadata.curation: [curator]hank@archive.org[/curator][date]20140805025247[/date][state]un-dark[/state][comment]correcting metadata for items that were un-darked but still show curatestate of "dark"[/comment]
